incidents.name: Delayed historic results for running CUPED experiments

incident_updates.body: The issue with delayed historic results for recently started CUPED experiments has been resolved. All data has been backfilled.

We have identified and mitigated an issue that resulted in delayed historic results for recently started CUPED experiments. With the underlying cause addressed, current CUPED results now show correct data. Additionally, we're backfilling historic result data and will post another update once this backfill is complete.

incidents.name: Teams Issues

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The initial fix resolved all teams issues for this incident. Permissions were not affected. There was no data loss and flag delivery was not impacted.

We have resolved the issue where some teams were not showing in the UI. Teams without members were not showing in the teams UI, all teams are displaying now. There is a related issue where teams with permissions of "No Access" are being overly restricted. We're confirming that the fix identified resolves this issue as well.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating an incident where some teams are missing from the UI. Data loss is not expected. Flag Delivery is not impacted.

incidents.name: Missing aggregate account usage chart data

incident_updates.body: The issue with missing some aggregate usage data in the account dashboards has been resolved. The backfill of missing data has completed and the impacted services have returned to normal operation. There was no data loss experienced.

The backfill of missing account usage charts data is still in progress. We have backfilled most data, but small portion still remains. We expect the process to complete within the next day. We will post another update and resolve this incident once the backfill is fully completed.

The issue with missing some aggregate usage data in the account dashboards has been identified and a fix has been implemented. We are in the process of backfilling the missing data. We will post another update and resolve this incident once the backfill process is completed.

We have identified the issue with customer account dashboards missing some usage aggregate data since Dec 20. There is no data loss. We are working on the fix and will post an update once issue is resolved.

Service operation is not impacted, the issue is limited to account usage charts.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

All customers are experiencing the missing percentage rollout option from the Serve dropdown in the feature flag rule edit page. 

Feature flags that are not using percentage rollout or already have the percentage rollout can still be created or edited. Percentage rollout in a rule can still be created via API. 

We have identified the issue and are working on a fix. We will provide updates as they become available.
